text: Norman Manuel Abramson (April 1, 1932biography from IEEE (1964) â€“ December 1, 2020) was an American engineer and computer scientist. He was most known for creating the ALOHAnet system for wireless computer communication. ==References== ==Other websites== * Engineering and Technology History Wiki *Biography from IEEE * Oral history interview with Severo Ornstein, Charles Babbage Institute, University of Minnesota.
